Actions.Name: Clutch
Effects: Deals bonus damage to bloodied characters.

The [name] sinks its claws into the target, grabbing them with elongated limbs. If the targeted character ends their turn within range 3 of the [name], it pulls them in, removing them from the battlefield and placing them adjacent to the [name]. They then take damage equal to 25% of their maximum hp. Either way, this effect ends at the end of their turn.

Actions.Name: Melt Face
Actions.Description: A foe in range 3 takes 2 damage and is blinded.

Actions.Name: Stretch Flesh
Actions.Description: A character in range has their flesh warped across space. The character takes 2 damage, then is shoved 1 in any direction. They must then save or be shoved 2 again in any direction. Allies and bloodied foes fail this save.

Actions.Name: Elongate
Actions.Description: The [name] warps a character's localized space, causing them to occupy an arc 3 area instead of their normal space while marked. When they move, move one space of their area and then place the rest in any valid configuration.
